Package junitx.tool

Provides classes that are meant to be used externally to the framework or the test classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TestClassValidator.ClassValidator Class reponsible for validating a given class.
TestClassValidator.ClassValidatorListener Listener that will receive update from the ClassValidator object.
 

Class Summary
TestClassValidator Usage
TestClassValidator.DefaultClassValidator Provides a default implementation for the ClassValidator interface.
 

Package junitx.tool Description

Provides classes that are meant to be used externally to the framework or the test classes.
